TITLE: Study Skills
DEF: Techniques for the effective acquisition, retetention, and application of knowledge
TASK: The Study Skills pattern enhances a range of techniques that bolster learners' ability to acquire, retain, and apply knowledge effectively. This pattern proves instrumental in equipping learners with various strategies that boost their learning efficiency and success. To optimize this pattern, educators should introduce a diverse array of study techniques, provide practice opportunities, and aid learners in identifying and adopting the most potent strategies according to their needs.
